did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Legal Papers of Eugene Semmes Ives, 1902-1916
did.abstract: Case files including legal papers, notes and other material concerning Ives' cases. Included are files related to Albert Steinfeld, Epes Randolph, Louis Zeckendorf, and various mining, railroad, and power companies.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.p: Legal Papers of Eugene Semmes Ives (AZ 143). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized alphabetically by case.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Case files including legal papers, notes and other material concerning Ives' cases. Included are files related to Albert Steinfeld, Epes Randolph, Louis Zeckendorf, and various mining, railroad, and power companies.

item.subject: Mines and mineral resources -- Arizona -- History -- Sources.
